name: Siebel Scripting Review: Use of the SetViewMode() method
description: Using number constants instead of literal ones increases the maintenance effort for the code.
output: This rule reports Functions calling SetViewMode
rationale: The SetViewMode( ) method is used within scripts containing number parameter instead of literal constants.
remediation: Method SetViewMode sets the visibility type for the business component. This is used prior to a query. It is recommended to use literal constants instead of the number parameter in order to increase code clarity.
total: Number of added or modified eScripts
